uniqueSellingPoints: No preset spending limit (flexible credit support)
1,000 monthly bonus points on 6 qualifying transactions
Gold Collection redemption offers excellent value (up to ₹0.58/point)
Transfer partners including Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer and Marriott Bonvoy
meta.verdict: The American Express Gold Charge Card is an excellent entry-level charge card for those who can pay their full balance monthly and want to maximize rewards. The card shines with its 5X Reward Multiplier, monthly bonus points milestone, and high-value Gold Collection redemptions. However, the lack of lounge access, no EMI option, limited acceptance at smaller merchants, and requirement to pay full balance make it unsuitable for everyone. Best combined with another card for broader acceptance and EMI needs.
